title: Creamy Grasshopper

author.name: Lauren Fitzgerald
author.note: Jackie Sobon is author of Vegan Bowl Attack!, a blogger, and professional food photographer who has an insatiable sweet tooth and loves playing with her food.

description: This decadent cocktail marries chocolate and mint, and gets its bright green hue from fresh kale.

instructions: In a cocktail shaker, add creme de menthe, creme de cacao, coconut milk, kale juice, and ice cubes.
Shake vigorously, then strain into two martini glasses and garnish with grated dark chocolate.

sidebars.label: Glam Garnishes
content: For spirited cocktail finishers, adorn with crystallized lemon or orange, edible gold dust, or crushed candy cane.
